text: Por maam phena mben kav, mba bunin mbe nzuav kim, mpari mpuveni vhɨzgi. Ana mba phenan kav, zazera ŋkɨɨar mba phena namkama ndɨɨi. Ana kim, gumgi ana han phenan zim, ana guigira ndikndigi.28.30 Ruk mba mpari mpuveni vhɨzgim, ana Porar hɨgi bigi, ana nta bun nza suaŋgi fhuvara. Mbe gumgi mbari kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, mbe Romiŋ, mbe phena tɨvanen Por fhɨrgim, ana kɨrar hɨgap vov, harigi fhaiŋ ŋguir vugap, Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ bun mbe nzuai. Mbe gumgi mbari kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, mbe Romiŋ Por shogim, ana rimgi.
